FILE
  HareDeclarationsImpl(DECLARATIONS)
    HareGeneralDeclarationImpl(GENERAL_DECLARATION)
      HareTypeDeclarationImpl(TYPE_DECLARATION)
        PsiElement(TYPE_KW)('type')
        HareTypeBindingsImpl(TYPE_BINDINGS)
          HareTypeBindingImpl(TYPE_BINDING)
            HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
              PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
            PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
            HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
              HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                HareStructUnionTypeImpl(STRUCT_UNION_TYPE)
                  PsiElement(UNION_KW)('union')
                  PsiElement(LBR)('{')
                  HareStructUnionFieldsImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELDS)
                    HareStructUnionFieldImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELD)
                      PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('i')
                      PsiElement(COLON)(':')
                      HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
                        HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                          HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                            HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                              PsiElement(I32_TYPE)('i32')
                    PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
                    HareStructUnionFieldImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELD)
                      PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('b')
                      PsiElement(COLON)(':')
                      HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
                        HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                          HareStructUnionTypeImpl(STRUCT_UNION_TYPE)
                            PsiElement(UNION_KW)('union')
                            PsiElement(LBR)('{')
                            HareStructUnionFieldsImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELDS)
                              HareStructUnionFieldImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELD)
                                PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('i')
                                PsiElement(COLON)(':')
                                HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
                                  HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                                    HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                                      HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                                        PsiElement(I64_TYPE)('i64')
                            PsiElement(RBR)('}')
                    PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
                    HareStructUnionFieldImpl(STRUCT_UNION_FIELD)
                      HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
                        PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
                        PsiElement(SCOPE)('::')
                        PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('bc')
                  PsiElement(RBR)('}')
      PsiElement(EOS)(';')
